transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Are ya ha, main na unse

Executive: India mart se bol rahe hain.

Customer: Haan ji India mart se bol rahi hu na.

Executive: Haan hum to main thoda India mart se mera abhi matlab manufacturing hai. To mera register hai company register Om Sai Udyog ke naam se. To mera lead manager jo hai unka number thoda chahiye.

Executive: Matlab jo account manager hai mujhe ek bar aapka jo primary number hai wo wala bata dijiye aap mujhe.

Executive: 9439

Executive: 9439

Executive: 62

Executive: 62

Executive: 9003

Executive: 9003

Executive: Haan Om Sai Udyog main hi to hu shayad isme. One second mere pass hi hai sir aapka account main Samreen bol rahi hu aap se pehle bhi baat hui hogi.

Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji ji mere pass hi hai sir aapka account main aapki account manager hi hu India mart se.

Customer: Oh ho aap hi hamara account manager hai.

Executive: Haan ji haan ji mere pass meri pehle bhi aap se baat hui hai. Maine direct number bhi diya tha aapko 9179 wala 656522.

Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: Receive kiya hoga aapne maine hello ka message fir se bhej deti hu maine dekhiye maine bhej diya aapne mere number se aapko direct wala message ye dekhiye ye hai. Hai na? Bataiye na sir kuch concern aap face kar rahe ho?

Customer: Haan thoda main hamara marketing mein naya banda join kiye hain.

Executive: Achcha, theek hai.

Customer: To thoda guide kar dijiye kaise kya lead lene ka hai. Haan aur kahan pe kya training karne ke liye achcha rahega thoda.

Executive: Haan main unko training wagera. Ji ji sahi baat hai training wala baat karni hai. Aap mujhse baat karaiye to unki ek bar.

Customer: Haan lijiye lijiye.

Customer: Hello mam.

Executive: Hello hi sir Samreen bol rahi hu good evening kaise hain?

Customer: Achcha achcha madam.

Executive: Ji main account manager hu aap logo ki.

Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: Theek hai main aapko na training provide karungi pure one week ki training rahegi. Aap pehle to mujhe na aapka number direct number bataiye na jisme main baat kar pau aap se.

Customer: Hello

Customer: Ek second madam.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Ye number ka jo hamara jo mobile ka number call kar dunga direct.

Executive: Haan maine de diya hai alag se diya aap logo ko. Hai na baki abhi bhi baat ho abhi main thoda sa bata mere wala number jo hai direct wala whatsapp mein kar diya hai maine theek hai baki main thoda sa aapko bata deti hu jaise mobile se chalayenge aap ya laptop ya desktop pe.

Customer: Haan desktop se.

Executive: Desktop se. Desktop mein na google pe seller.indiamart.com aapko search karna padta hai likhkar.

Customer: Haan madam.

Executive: Seller.seller.indiamart.com seller.com ha na to uske baad sign in bhi kar diya hai sign in kar diya hai paid account sign sign in kiya hai na sir se number dal ke aapne sign in kiya hai na.

Customer: Haan primary number theek hai. Left side mein aap dekhenge to dashboard likha aayega profile lead manager by lead aisa likha aa raha hai?

Customer: Haan madam.

Executive: Left side mein to jo by lead hota hai na basically usi pe work karna hota hai apan ko.

Customer: Okay madam.

Executive: Theek hai waha par aap dekhoge na to aapke product se related requirement dikhegi waha par aapko.

Customer: Product likha hua hai na.

Executive: Haan ha nahi nahi by lead dikha hai aap mujhe apna number dijiye na isme aur clarity mein batati hu aapko.

Customer: 7381

Executive: Jisse meri directly aap se baat ho.

Customer: Okay madam 73

Executive: 73

Customer: 810

Executive: 810

Customer: 13

Executive: 13

Customer: 13

Customer: 270

Executive: 270

Executive: 270 na ye hai 73810 13270 correct?

Customer: 70 ha madam.

Executive: Maine hello ka message kiya hai theek hai aapki jo mail id aapke system mein lagi hui hai na?

Customer: Haan madam.

Executive: Wo mail id aap mujhe whatsapp mein click ke dijiye dekhiye maine hello ka message kiya aaya?

Customer: Haan aaya.

Executive: Isme mujhe ek mail id aap dijiye jo aapke laptop mein abhi chalu hai wo wali screen share karke sikha dungi.

Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: Theek hai?

Customer: Okay madam.

Executive: Hmm aap mujhe bhejiye maine dekh liya hello ka message yaha pe maine kiya hai na Samreen is type mein likh deti hu. Usi mein bhejiye main appointment bana lu jab tak aap mujhe bhejenge waise hi main appointment banaungi aur aapko call back karungi 73 wale number pe call back karungi theek hai?

Customer: Okay madam.

Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's new marketing employee needs training.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a week-long training.

- Executive explained how to search seller.indiamart.com on desktop.

- Executive explained the importance of 'buyleads'.

- Executive requested email ID for screen sharing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share email ID on WhatsApp.

- Executive will create an appointment and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- training, buyleads, account management, indiamart
